thread.title: 'Star Wars'-Themed Luxury Watch from Devon Costs as Much as a Car
thread.title_full: 'Star Wars'-Themed Luxury Watch from Devon Costs as Much as a Car - NBC News

author: nbcnews.com
title: 'Star Wars'-Themed Luxury Watch from Devon Costs as Much as a Car
text:
Devon At last, there's a way to outdo your "Star Wars" nerd friends and your watch nerd friends — at the same time. A new timepiece from luxury watchmaker Devon takes design cues from the movies' Empire, all ridged black metal and high contrast. There's a touch of the TIE Fighter, a bit of Darth Vader's helmet, and, although only true fans will notice, the Imperial crest at the bottom of the watch.
Related: Star Wars BB-8 Droid Will Be the Gift All Young Jedi Crave This Season
The face of this timepiece is similar to previous watches Devon made, utilizing a unique belt system that has the numbers crawl by in various directions. It sounds confusing, but in fact it's pretty straightforward to read — although not so much to design and manufacture. This highly complex and limited-edition watch (only 500 will be made) is going to run you $28,500.
advertisement You could almost get a used X-wing for that money, but for many "Star Wars" and wristwatch aficionados, price is no object. And who can resist the complimentary TIE Fighter cuff links that come with?
